statements: DELETE FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE department='Engineering' AND gender='Male';
DELETE FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE tenure_years > 5 AND race_ethnicity='Asian';
DELETE FROM diversity_metrics WHERE employee_id = 100 AND age < 30;
DELETE FROM inclusion_metrics WHERE inclusion_training_completed = 'False' AND team_satisfaction_score > 80;
DELETE FROM diversity_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM diversity_metrics WHERE employee_id = 101 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM employee_reviews WHERE rating < 3 AND review_id > 50;
